languages.text: "Зависит от того, как много из нас окажутся неблагонадежными. Тщательное расследование выявит это, но даже если нас останется с десяток, мы все равно будем до последнего вздоха служить закону Его".

"That depends on how many of us are found wanting. This will be established during the course of a thorough investigation, but even if only a dozen of us are left in the end, we will still continue to serve His Law until our last breath."
languages.original_text: "Зависит от того, как много из нас окажутся неблагонадежными. Тщательное расследование выявит это, но даже если нас останется с десяток, мы все равно будем до последнего вздоха служить закону Его".

traits.locale_text: "That depends on how many of us will be found wanting. This will be established during the course of a thorough investigation, but even if merely a dozen of us will be left in the end, we will still continue to serve His law until our last breath."

"That depends on how many of us are found wanting. This will be established during the course of a thorough investigation, but even if only a dozen of us are left in the end, we will still continue to serve His Law until our last breath."

languages.text: 「私たちのうち、何人が不適格と見なされるかによります。このことは徹底的な調査の中で明らかになるでしょう。最終的に生き残るのがたとえわずか十数人になったとしても、私たちは最後の一息まで、陛下の法に仕え続けます」
languages.original_text: "That depends on how many of us are found wanting. This will be established during the course of a thorough investigation, but even if only a dozen of us are left in the end, we will still continue to serve His Law until our last breath."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちのうち、何人が不適格と見なされるかによります。このことは徹底的な調査の中で明らかになるでしょう。最終的に生き残るのがたとえわずか十数人になったとしても、私たちは最後の一息まで、陛下の法に仕え続けます」

languages.text: "Das kommt darauf an, wie viele von uns sich als unzulänglich herausstellen. Wir werden das im Laufe einer gründlichen Untersuchung herausfinden, aber selbst wenn am Ende nur noch ein Dutzend von uns übrig ist, werden wir dennoch weiterhin bis zum letzten Atemzug Seinem Gesetz dienen."
languages.original_text: "That depends on how many of us are found wanting. This will be established during the course of a thorough investigation, but even if only a dozen of us are left in the end, we will still continue to serve His Law until our last breath."

traits.locale_text: "Das kommt darauf an, wie viele von uns sich als unzulänglich herausstellen. Wir werden das im Laufe einer gründlichen Untersuchung herausfinden, aber selbst wenn am Ende nur noch ein Dutzend von uns übrig ist, werden wir dennoch weiterhin bis zum letzten Atemzug Seinem Gesetz dienen."

languages.text: « Cela dépendra de notre effectif. Nous allons effectuer un recensement lors d'une enquête approfondie, et même si nous ne sommes pas plus qu'une douzaine, nous continuerons de servir Sa loi jusqu'à notre dernier souffle. »
languages.original_text: "That depends on how many of us are found wanting. This will be established during the course of a thorough investigation, but even if only a dozen of us are left in the end, we will still continue to serve His Law until our last breath."

traits.locale_text: « Cela dépendra de notre effectif. Nous allons effectuer un recensement lors d'une enquête approfondie, et même si nous ne sommes pas plus qu'une douzaine, nous continuerons de servir Sa loi jusqu'à notre dernier souffle. »

« Cela dépendra de notre effectif. Nous allons effectuer un recensement lors d'une enquête approfondie, et même si nous ne sommes pas plus qu'une douzaine, nous continuerons de servir Sa loi jusqu'à notre dernier souffle. »

languages.text: «Eso depende de cuántos de nosotros sean considerados deficientes. Esto se determinará durante el transcurso de una investigación concienzuda, pero aunque al final solo quedemos una docena de nosotros, continuaremos al servicio de Sus leyes hasta exhalar nuestro último aliento».
languages.original_text: "That depends on how many of us are found wanting. This will be established during the course of a thorough investigation, but even if only a dozen of us are left in the end, we will still continue to serve His Law until our last breath."

traits.locale_text: «Eso depende de cuántos de nosotros sean considerados deficientes. Esto se determinará durante el transcurso de una investigación concienzuda, pero aunque al final solo quedemos una docena de nosotros, continuaremos al servicio de Sus leyes hasta exhalar nuestro último aliento».

languages.text: “这取决于我们之中还有多少人犯下了罪过，我们会在接下来彻查中找到答案。不过，即便我们最后只剩下十几个人，我们依然会继续为帝皇的律法服务，直到咽下最后一口气为止。”
languages.original_text: "That depends on how many of us are found wanting. This will be established during the course of a thorough investigation, but even if only a dozen of us are left in the end, we will still continue to serve His Law until our last breath."

traits.locale_text: “这取决于我们之中还有多少人犯下了罪过，我们会在接下来彻查中找到答案。不过，即便我们最后只剩下十几个人，我们依然会继续为帝皇的律法服务，直到咽下最后一口气为止。”

languages.text: "Kaçımızın yetersiz olduğuna göre değişir. Bu durum, kapsamlı bir soruşturma sırasında tespit edilecektir ancak nihayetinde bir avuç insan kalsak bile son nefesimize kadar O'nun Yasası'na hizmet etmeye devam edeceğiz."
languages.original_text: "That depends on how many of us are found wanting. This will be established during the course of a thorough investigation, but even if only a dozen of us are left in the end, we will still continue to serve His Law until our last breath."

traits.locale_text: "Kaçımızın yetersiz olduğuna göre değişir. Bu durum, kapsamlı bir soruşturma sırasında tespit edilecektir ancak nihayetinde bir avuç insan kalsak bile son nefesimize kadar O'nun Yasası'na hizmet etmeye devam edeceğiz."

"Kaçımızın yetersiz olduğuna göre değişir. Bu durum, kapsamlı bir soruşturma sırasında tespit edilecektir ancak nihayetinde bir avuç insan kalsak bile, son nefesimize kadar O'nun kanunlarına hizmet etmeye devam edeceğiz."

languages.original_text: "That depends on how many of us are found wanting. This will be established during the course of a thorough investigation, but even if only a dozen of us are left in the end, we will still continue to serve His Law until our last breath."
